title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked as dirty by code assist
description: When code assist is triggered, even when there are no suggestions, the file is marked as dirty without any actual changes made.
OB: When code assist is triggered, the file is marked as dirty without any actual changes made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file.
2. Trigger code assist when there are no suggestions available.
3. Verify that the file is not marked as dirty.
